page.title: 03The founding of Elton School
page.content: The Will of Jane Proby (dated 1st April 1712) provided money to set up two schools in Elton.Her Will said "The children when admitted shall from thenceforth come every day to school from six to eleven in the morning and from one to five in the afternoon save in winter time when they shall not be obliged to come before it is light nor to tarry after it is dark.As soon as they come to school every morning and before they are dismissed at night the psalms for the day shall be repeated and a chapter read out of the Old Testament in the morning and out of the New in the afternoon and then the master shall go to prayers with them,and as often as there are public prayers in the church they shall all go with their Master thither who shall take care of them and see that they behave themselves reverently there."
